scripts.prod: source .env && export TWILIO_API_KEY=$TWILIO_API_KEY && TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=$TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID && TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER=$TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER && MAILGUN_API_KEY=$MAILGUN_API_KEY && export DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY && docker compose up --build
scripts.dev: source .env && export TWILIO_API_KEY=$TWILIO_API_KEY && TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=$TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID && TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER=$TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER && MAILGUN_API_KEY=$MAILGUN_API_KEY && export DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY && docker compose -f compose.dev.yaml up --build
scripts.start: export TWILIO_API_KEY=$TWILIO_API_KEY && TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=$TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID && TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER=$TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER && MAILGUN_API_KEY=$MAILGUN_API_KEY && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL && export NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY=$NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY && graphile-worker --connection $DATABASE_URL
